## Resources.CandidateReducer.reduceToChildResourceCandidateDecls() method

Static convenience method to construct an array of properly reduced [child resource candidate declarations](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ichildresourcecandidatedecl.md) from a set of [resource candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static reduceToChildResourceCandidateDecls(candidates: ReadonlyArray<ResourceCandidate>, filterForContext?: Context.IValidatedContextDecl): ResourceJson.Json.IChildResourceCandidateDecl[];
```
